intro: Build your spicy empire, one blush-worthy item at a time!
description:
Ever dreamt of running a shop that’s a little… spicier? In Hentai Shop Simulator, you’re the proud owner of a one-of-a-kind store catering to anime fans with a taste for the bold. Stock shelves with eye-catching magazines and cheeky merchandise, manage your inventory like a pro, and watch your profits soar. Just remember—your niche is adult content, so keep it classy...ish.

Key Features:
- Customize & Expand: Spruce up your shop, grow your floor space, and design a layout that keeps customers browsing (and blushing).
- Hire Staff: Bring in employees to handle the hard work, like restocking and managing the register, so you can focus on running the show.
- Smart Management: Set competitive prices and pick the perfect products to turn your store into a must-visit hotspot.

Turn your cheeky little store into an empire of spicy delights! Whether you're here for business or just a bit of fun, success is only a sale away. Ready to stock up and stand out? The market’s all yours!
